amendment.description: To require a report on protecting commercial aircraft from the threat of man-portable air defense systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3642 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3642 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S9194-9195; text: CR S9195) To require a report on protecting commercial aircraft from the threat of man-portable air defense systems.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3642 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3642 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Boxer.
